column2: These Mummies have been embalmed and reinforced with secret ointments and oils, making their bodies highly resistant to damage - but also highly flammable.
Mummies are no mere zombies, they fight with skill and strength beyond normal humans. However, the way they have been preserved makes them slow on the advance.
The mere touch of a Mummy curses their opponents, sapping their strength and reducing their ability to fight back.
